title: What is Alesha Dixon’s baby’s name and when did she give birth?
text:
Alesha Dixon has welcomed her second daughter into the world (Picture: Getty Images)

Alesha Dixon has confirmed that she has given birth to her second child after sparking a whole lot of speculation about her pregnancy in recent days.

The Britain’s Got Talent judge announced the happy news in an Instagram post as she shared a snap of her new daughter, saying she felt like ‘the luckiest girl on the planet’.

Alesha’s pregnancy was revealed during the first live semi-final of the series back in May, before she appeared with a baby bump during the spin-off series Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions.

Ahead of that show’s final on Saturday night however, she was spotted filming for America’s Got Talent: The Champions with a noticeably flat stomach, sparking rumours that she had indeed welcomed the newest member of her family.

Here’s what you need to know about her new arrival.

Advertisement

Advertisement

What is Alesha Dixon’s baby’s name?

Little Anaya was born in August (Picture: Alesha Dixon/Instagram)

Alesha revealed on Instagram that her new daughter’s name is Anaya Safiya.

The baby is a sister for her first child, six-year-old Azura Sienna, and her second child with her partner, dancer and model Azuka Ononye, whom she has been with for over 10 years.

The pregnancy was announced during Ant and Dec’s opening musical number as the Britain’s Got Talent live shows kicked off, during which they sang the lyrics ‘Alesha is expecting’.

Alesha’s baby bump was very much on view during Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

The singer had previously admitted in 2018 that she feared she was ‘too old’ to have another baby.

‘I don’t know whether it will happen given my age but I adore the idea of a large family and I hope I will be lucky,’ she told You magazine at the time.

When did Alesha Dixon give birth?

Alesha has been with partner Azuka Ononye for over 10 years (Picture: David M. Benett/Dave Benett/Getty Images)

Alesha actually welcomed little Anaya into the world seven weeks ago.

She said on social media that the little one was born on 20 August – but had chosen today, her 41st birthday, to introduce her to the rest of the world.

‘7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet,’ she said.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The former Mis-teeq star also chose her birthday to announce the birth of Azura back in 2013.

She told Loose Women earlier this year that she felt ‘so much more relaxed’ with this pregnancy, saying: ‘I feel great actually.

‘It’s great the first time around you read every single book going and the second time you’re like “I’ve got this.”.’

description: Alesha Dixon has welcomed her second daughter into the world - here's what you need to know about the new arrival and when she was born.
